name: slidev
description: Create developer-focused technical presentations using Slidev with enforced evidence-based design guardrails. Modular slide structure, multi-platform diagrams (Mermaid, PlantUML, Excalidraw), and complete workflow from brainstorming to LaTeX handouts. Hard limits: ≤6 elements, <50 words, 18pt+ fonts, colorblind-safe colors.
